name: Orange Crispy Chicken
description: A zesty, crispy delight inspired by Chinese restaurant favorites, now you can make it at home! This Orange Crispy Chicken features cubed chicken thighs or breasts tossed in crispy flour, fried to golden perfection, and coated in a tangy orange sauce.

instructions: Shake it up! Toss chicken cubes in crispy flour.
Dip and drip! Dip in batter (flour + water).
Fry time! Fry until golden brown. Set aside.
Saucy mix! Mix sugar, vinegar, orange zest, juice, soy sauce, salt, garlic, and corn starch.
Simmer down! Simmer the sauce until thick.
Mix it up! Coat chicken with the sauce.
